SEO.indexDesc: Portfolio of Michiel Leunens, photographer, developer and filmmaker. Michiel is a Belgian computer sciences student with a passion for technology and pictures.

SEO.photoDesc: Some shots taken by Michiel Leunens, Leunes Media. Michiel shoots events, products, landscapes, weddings, corporations and more.

index.photoContent: Snapping life's precious & short moments, shooting moody landscapes, capturing intriguing eyes and everything in between.
index.devContent: Having a website is cool, having an app is cooler. Want me to make both? As a top-notch Computer Science student at UGent, I can deliver. But first: coffee.
index.filmContent: Making dope videos with actual visual effects since '11. Looking for a cool way to promote your business? Relive the moment like you were there through an aftermovie? Look no further!

about.subtitle: My name is Michiel Leunens.
about.title: I'm a professional photographer, developer, filmmaker and everything in-between.
about.content: Welcome to my website! If we've already met each other: glad to see you again! If not, well then let me introduce myself. I'm 21 years old and currently studying Computer Sciences at the University of Ghent. While my studies focus on becoming a full-stack developer, I also strive to become a great photographer and filmmaker. That's why I founded Leunes Media, so I can do both. Let's work together!
about.knowledge: I also have an extensive knowledge of
about.footnote: *excluding basic knowledge of a lot of other frameworks/libraries/software/etc

dev.gPDesc: An app for the Universal Windows Platform, or UWP for short. Get your business out there. Share events. Watch for promotions. Be Ghent.
